articles.title: Lionel Messi's World Cup? Argentina team built around him echoes Diego Maradona's success in Mexico in 1986
articles.description: Argentina’s workmanlike team playing to support a genius is a template that has worked before. Will it be enough again as Lionel Messi pursues his World Cup dream?
articles.content: It was as if the first half an hour of the game, the first half of this World Cup even, had been part of his long con. A setup. In a similar situation shortly before, Lionel Messi had shot wide. For much of the tournament, that pass had been stroked ... [6384 chars]

articles.title: Jamie Carragher says Gareth Southgate could have been braver with England subs in World Cup defeat to France
articles.description: Jamie Carragher believes Gareth Southgate could have been braver with his use of substitutes in England’s quarter-final defeat to France – and is now hoping Argentina win the World Cup instead so that Lionel Messi can cement his status as the greatest

articles.title: What makes the semi-finalists so different and Qatar 2022's legacy
articles.description: Argentina, Croatia, France and Morocco have made it to the semi-finals of FIFA World Cup 2022.
articles.content: Long before the 2022 FIFA World Cup began in Qatar, it was dubbed as one of a kind. It was the first time a country in the Middle East was hosting the event, and was also the first (and perhaps only) time the World Cup will be held in the winter. The... [7016 chars]

articles.title: 'We Have Tough Matches in The Group Stage': Hockey Legend Zafar Iqbal on India's World Cup Hopes
articles.description: Hockey World Cup 2023: Australia, Belgium, Netherlands, India, Argentina, Germany, New Zealand, England, France, Korea, Malaysia, Spain, South Africa, Japan, Chile, and Wales are the 16 teams, who will be competing in the tournament.
articles.content:
As the clock ticks closer to the FIH Odisha Hockey Men’s World Cup 2023, with less than 40 days to go, hockey legend Zafar Iqbal recalled his time with the Indian team in the 1970s and 1980s.
